alerts.LaunchError: Launch data is incorrect, please contact the administrator.
alerts.FatalError: A fatal error occurred, please contact the administrator.
alerts.Bookmark: Would you like to open last visited page?
alerts.CBTStructureXMLLoadError: Fatal error: failed to load cbtStructure XML file.
alerts.CBTStructureXMLSecurityError: Security error occurred while loading cbt structure xml
alerts.LessonXMLFilePathError: Lesson XML file path not specified in [core_vendor] parameter.
alerts.LMSDataLoadError: Error occurred while loading data from LMS.
alerts.AICCDataLoadError: Error occurred while loading AICC data.
alerts.ContentLoadError: Error occurred while loading content data.
alerts.SendPutParamError: Error occurred while sending PutParam data.
alerts.SendExitAUError: Error occurred while sending exitAu data.
alerts.AICCDataSendError: Error occurred while sending AICC data to Player.
alerts.LessonDataSendError: Error occurred while sending lesson data to Player.
alerts.ExitCourse: Are you sure you would like to exit?
alerts.ExitLesson: Are you sure you would like to exit?
alerts.ConnectMenuError: Error occurred while connecting to ModuleMenu movie.
alerts.InvalidDataFromDataModel: Invalid data sent by Data model.
alerts.SetElementValueError: Error occurred while setting value of element.
alerts.OpenParamFile: Cannot find file param.cmi in the specified folder. Do you want to open it manually? If no, player will use the default setting.
alerts.ConnectContentGetStatusFailed: Connection failed while content page gets/sets status.
alerts.ConnectContentGetAnswerFailed: Connection failed while content page gets/sets answers.
alerts.ConfigXMLSecurityError: Security error occurred while loading config.xml.
alerts.PageXMLSecurityError: Security error occurred while loading page xml.
alerts.TooLongComments: Please do not enter more than 1,000 characters for comments.
alerts.ImageURLError: Unable to connect to images URL.
alerts.SendPutCommentsError: Error occurred while sending comments. Please try again.
alerts.SendPutInteractionsError: Error occurred while sending interactions. Please try again.
alerts.ExitMessage: Would you like to exit from the exam?
alerts.NoAnswerWarning: You have not answered this question yet.
alerts.GlossaryFileLoadError: IO error occurred while loading data from glossry text file.
alerts.GlossarySecurityError: Security error occurred while loading data from glossry text file.
alerts.InvalidCoreLesson: The record in the LMS doesn't match the current CBT course. An error may occur if you continue to proceed.
alerts.OutputFileErr: Invalid output file path in param.cmi.
alerts.SecurityError: Security error occured while writing the output file.
alerts.WritingOutputFileErr: Error occured while writing the output file.
alerts.DeleteParamFileErr: Error occured while deleting param file.
alerts.ExitTestLesson: Once you exit from the test lesson, you will not be allowed to re-enter. Do you want to continue?
alerts.ReviewPageError: Cannot find the specified review page.
alerts.ExitReviewPage: Are you sure you would like to exit the review page?
alerts.ExitReviewTestLesson: Sorry, you cannot review a test lesson.
alerts.ExitMessage: Would you like to exit from the exam?
alerts.LastPage: You have visited the last page. Click the next button to return back to the first screen or use the exit button to save status and exit.
alerts.LastPageAndCompleted: The course is completed. Please use the exit button to save status and exit. Clicking the next button will return back to the first screen.
alerts.CompleteCourse: The course is completed. Please use the exit button to save status and exit.
alerts.ArgumentError: The syntax of parameter is invalid.
alerts.URLError: Error occurred while launching this URL.
alerts.UnclickableItem: Sorry, this item has been disabled.
alerts.Instruction: Rapidly drag screen to left = go next page Rapidly drag screen to right = go previous page Rapidly drag screen down/up = turn Controll Panel on/off
